entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Regina Int'l Airport 1:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: E 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
